statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.USE_YN DESC, AA.CUSTOMER_NAME) AS ROW_NO , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , AA.CUSTOMER_NAME , M1.NAME AS CUSTOMER_TYPE , AA.USE_YN FROM UCD.CUSTOMERS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CUSTOMER_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'CUSTOMER_TYPE' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.CUSTOMER_ID , AA.CUSTOMER_NAME , AA.CUSTOMER_TYPE , AA.EMAIL , AA.HPAGE , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS
, AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
, AA.BIZ_REG_ID , BZ.BIZ_REG_NO , BZ.BIZ_NAME , BZ.REP_NAME , BZ.BIZ_TYPE , BZ.BIZ_ITEM
, BZ.ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
FROM UCD.CUSTOMERS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.BIZ_REG_CE BZ WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BIZ_REG_ID = BZ.BIZ_REG_ID LEFT JOIN UCD.ADDRESS AD WITH (NOLOCK) ON BZ.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UCD.CUSTOMERS ( CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_TYPE, EMAIL, HPAGE, USE_YN, REMARKS, BIZ_REG_ID, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #CUSTOMER_NAME#, #CUSTOMER_TYPE#, #EMAIL#, #HPAGE#, #USE_YN#, #REMARKS#, #BIZ_REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS CUSTOMER_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.CUSTOMERS SET CUSTOMER_NAME = #CUSTOMER_NAME# , CUSTOMER_TYPE = #CUSTOMER_TYPE# , EMAIL = #EMAIL# , HPAGE = #HPAGE# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , BIZ_REG_ID = #BIZ_REG_ID# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID#
